alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:47AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN AND SWITZERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM EDT... At 646 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Dillsboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Rising Sun, Pleasant, Hartford, Fairview, Center Square, Aberdeen, Pate, Benham, Avonburg, Moorefield, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, Friendship, East Enterprise, Cross Plains, Allensville, Quercus Grove, Mount Sterling, North Landing and Jacksonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
